name: Instant Music Downloader
body: # Instantly download any song! Without knowing the name of the song!!!! > This is so cool! #### Example ```❯ python music_downloader.py``` ```zsh >> Enter songname/ lyrics/ artist.. or whatever i tried so hard and got so far >>Downloaded Linkin Park - In The End ``` ```zsh >> Enter songname/ lyrics/ artist.. or whatever another turning point a fork stuck in the road >>Downloaded Green Day - Good Riddance ``` ```zsh >> Enter songname/ lyrics/ artist.. or whatever yeh hosla kaise jhuke >>Downloaded Yeh Hausla Kaise Jhuke - Salim-Sulaiman ``` ### Video ## Requirements 1. Python 2.7 or Python 3.4 2. Youtube-dl 3. BeautifulSoup ## Instructions Run `sh install.sh` from your terminal.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
